articles.title: Kim Jong Un Watches Maneuvers of KPA Combined Units
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Watches Maneuvers of KPA Combined Units
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of  the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, watched actual maneuvers between KPA large combined units 526 and 671.
					 After receiving a report on the plan of the maneuvers at an observation post, he watched them.
					
					 The Supreme Commander expressed his satisfaction over the maneuvers, noting that they were flawless in defensive and offensive aspects.
					
					 Saying he could see that the People's Army had conducted intensive drills with full preparations this year to carry out the tasks set forth by him when watching those units' actual maneuvers last year, he stressed that the People's Army should often conduct such maneuvers.
					
					 He highly appreciated the successful maneuvers, saying that the KPA large combined units 526 and 671 fully displayed their perfect defence and powerful offensive capability to repel any sudden attack from the enemy and go over to offensive in time.
					
					 He advanced the important tasks for intensifying the combat drills of the People's Army.
					
					 Practical drills should be conducted so often to cope with the hardest and severest war, he said, adding that it is useless to conduct any drill of formalism, stereotyped pattern and stylish manner, a drill unfit for the demand and style of modern warfare and the performance of any unit's combat duty, many times.
					
					 He gave precious instructions for perfecting the combat preparations, noting that the commanding and training officers should enhance their responsibility and role, the commanding and staff officers should make a deep study of various matters to be raised in offensive and defence and exert their initiative and creativity in commanding any combat, close cooperation should be maintained among units of all services and arms and special units while ensuring suddenness, promptness, conformability and accuracy in combat action, the capability of carrying out operation irrespective of seasons, climate, day and night should be raised, the soldiers should be practiced in the combat methods for actual war and a big efforts should be steadily directed to the work for modernizing the military hardware of supply units.
					
					 The Supreme Commander expressed his firm belief that the People's Army would intensify their military training, as the anti-Japanese guerrillas did in Mt. Paektu, under the slogan of the Party's training-first idea and thus greet the 7th WPK Congress with signal achievements in increasing the combat strength and rounding off the combat preparations.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Ri Jong Ok
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Ri Jong Ok
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Thursday sent a wreath to the bier of Ri Jong Ok, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter, expressing deep condolences over her death.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from UK Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from UK Ambassador
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Alastair William James Morgan, UK ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Bust of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Bust of Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong Thursday, her 98th birth anniversary. 
					 Seen standing before the bust was a wreath sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present at a wreath laying-ceremony were Pak Yong Sik, Kwak Pom Gi, Kim Phyong Hae, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier, Kim Su Gil, chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, Cabinet, working people's organizations and working people in the city.
					
					 Placed before the bust were wreaths in the names of the C.C., the WPK, Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 Wreaths in the names of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, working people's organizations, units of the Korean People's Army, party and power bodies and factories in the city were laid before the bust.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence while looking back upon her revolutionary career. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front also visited her bust at the cemetery and paid tribute to her.

articles.title: Subway Train Makers Commended in DPRK
articles.content:
Subway Train Makers Commended in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Officials, workers, scientists, technicians, teachers and researchers of the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex and other relevant sectors were commended with due ceremony Thursday in the DPRK. They contributed to newly making a subway train with indigenous efforts and technology.
					 Present there were officials, workers, scientists, technicians, teachers and researchers of the complex and the relevant sectors.
					
					 At the ceremony Pak Song Hak, a teacher of Pyongyang University of Railways, and Pak Mun Son, a work-team chief of the complex, were awarded the title of DPRK Labor Hero, Gold Medal (Hammer and Sickle) and Order of National Flag First Class.
					
					 Kim Kum Chol, a teacher of Pyongyang University of Railways, Kim Myong Bok, assembler of the complex, Choe Kyong Chol, welder of the complex, Ri Song Jin, work-team head of the complex, and Sin Sun Thae, workshop head of the complex, were honored to receive the watches bearing the august name of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Citations of supreme leader Kim Jong Un were conferred upon Won Kyong Su, teacher of Kim Il Sung University, Jo Song Chol, section chief at the Branch Academy of Railway Science under the State Academy of Sciences, Kim Chol Su, chief secretary of the party committee of the complex, Ku Pon Son, caster of the complex, Kim Chun Ho, work-team head of the complex, Jon Song Hyon, deputy head of a workshop of the complex, Rim Ho and Yu Jae Sik, workshop heads of the complex, and Ri Jong Sik, department director of the Ministry of Railways.
					
					 The title of Designer of Merit went to Ri Su Song, designer of the rolling stock design institute of the Ministry of Railways, the title of Scientist of Merit to Choe Yong Nam, researcher of Pyongyang University of Railways, and the title of Technician of Merit to Kim Chol Min, vice-chief engineer of the complex.
					
					 12 persons received Order of National Flag First Class, 28 persons Order of Labor and many other officials, workers, scientists, technicians, teachers and researchers orders and medals.

articles.title: Subway Train Makers Feted in DPRK
articles.content:
Subway Train Makers Feted in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- A reception in honor of the officials, workers, scientists, technicians, teachers and researchers of the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex and other relevant sectors was given at the Mokran House Thursday. They contributed to newly making a subway train of Korean style.
					 Present there on invitation were officials, workers, scientists, technicians, teachers and researchers of the complex and other relevant sectors.
					
					 Pak Pong Ju, Choe Thae Bok, O Su Yong, Ro Tu Chol, Jo Yon Jun and Vice-Premier Kim Tok Hun were on hand.
					
					 Pak Pong Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and premier of the Cabinet, made a speech.
					
					 Authorized by Marshal Kim Jong Un, Pak warmly congratulated those on newly making a subway train with indigenous efforts and technology.
					
					 They proved in practice the nature of the heroic workers, hardcore force, and the just determination of the WPK to accelerate the building of an economic power by believing and relying on their revolutionary spirit of self-reliance, he said.
					
					 He called for making uninterrupted innovation and progress by giving fullest play to the inexhaustible strength of the heroic Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's working class to greet the 7th Congress of the WPK with fresh achievements.

articles.title: North, South Women Meet
articles.content:
North, South Women Meet
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- A meeting of women in the north and the south of Korea for national reconciliation, unity, peace and reunification took place in Kaesong on Wednesday.
					 Present there from the north side were representatives of various women's organizations including the Central Committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea and from the south side were representatives of women's organizations including the Federation of Women's Organizations, the Women's Solidarity and the Women's Society for Achieving Peace.
					
					 Speeches were made by representatives of women's organizations of the north and the south.
					
					 The speakers called on the women in the north and the south to value the agreements reached between the two sides and to thoroughly implement them in order to open a fresh turning phase in improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving independent reunification.
					
					 They underscored the need to intensify solidarity and unity among the women in the north and the south in the efforts to put an end to confrontation between fellow countrymen and remove the danger of a war on the Korean Peninsula, protect security of the nation and its peace and achieve national reconciliation, unity, peace and reunification.
					
					 An appeal to all the Korean women in the north, south and abroad was adopted there.
					
					 The appeal said that what the women in the north and the south and all other Koreans want is not antagonism and distrust between fellow countrymen but reconciliation and unity of the nation, and not hostility and confrontation but peace and independent reunification of the country.
					
					 It called for defusing the danger of war and putting an end to confrontation between the fellow countrymen on this land and firmly defending security and peace of the nation.
					
					 It also called for brisk contacts, visits, solidarity activities and diverse meetings between women's organizations in the north and the south next year to promote the improved inter-Korean relations and achieve national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 At the end of the meeting the representatives enjoyed an art performance given by women's organizations of the north and the south.
					
					 They toured historic relics in Kaesong area and went round a handicrafts and fine art exhibition.

articles.title: Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youths and children visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and portraits depicting their smiling images across the country on December 24, the 24th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Seen standing before the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill was a floral basket sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Laid before the statues were floral baskets in the names of the party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions, industrial establishments and schools in the city and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before their statues and portraits.
					
					 The people visited in an endless stream the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and portraits of their smiling images in different places of the city, including Kim Il Sung University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security and the Mansudae Art Studio.
					
					 Service personnel, working people and school youths and children across the country placed floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and portraits of their smiling images in their residential areas.

articles.title: Dancing Party of Officials, Members of Women's Union Held
articles.content:
Dancing Party of Officials, Members of Women's Union Held
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- There took place a dancing party of officials and members of the women's union at the plaza of the Arch of Triumph on Thursday, the 24th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Amid the playing of songs "Glory to General" and "Our Leader Loved by People", the participants danced, yearning for Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 They danced to the tune of "Thunder over Jong Il Peak", "Our General Is the Best" and other songs.
					
					 Dancing to the tune of "Arirang in Jiansanfeng" and other songs, they were determined to prepare themselves to be true women revolutionaries.
					
					 "People's Country" and other songs resounded forth.

articles.title: Women's Union Officials, Members Visit Kim Jong Suk's Birthplace in Hoeryong
articles.content:
Women's Union Officials, Members Visit Kim Jong Suk's Birthplace in Hoeryong 
 Hoeryong, December 24 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea from Pyongyang and local areas visited the birthplace of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk in Hoeryong on Thursday, her 98th birth anniversary. 
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets before her statue at the foot of Osan Hill and paid tribute to her. 
					
					 Being briefed on the story telling how Kim Jong Suk grew to be a revolutionary, they went round mementoes preserved at her old home at the foot of Osan Hill. 
					
					 They went to the Hoeryong Revolutionary Museum to learn about the revolutionary exploits of the woman commander of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 They also visited Mangyang Ferry through which she crossed the Tuman River in her early years with sorrow as a member of the stateless nation and with hatred toward the Japanese imperialists. 
					
					 They also went round Kim Ki Song Hoeryong Senior Secondary School, Hoeryong Foodstuff-processing Factory and Hoeryong Koryo Medicine Pharmaceutical Factory which are associated with the exploits of leader Kim Jong Il on the same day.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youths and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youths and Students Held
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youths and students took place in Pyongyang and other parts of the country on Dec. 24, the 24th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 98th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 Amid the playing of song "Fortune of Korea" at the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, Pyongyang Railway Station, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and other places in the capital city, the participants danced, paying high tribute and extending eternal glory to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They danced to the tune of "People's Country" and other songs, revering for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They were determined to glorify their lives in the van of the struggle to implement the behests of the great leaders and uphold the party's policies by learning from Kim Jong Suk's spirit of devotedly defending the leader.
					
					 The mood of dancing parties revved up amid the playing of songs "We Will Devote Our Youth to Motherland", "Dash toward Future" and "Victory Will Be Won Generation after Generation".
					
					 Dancing parties were also held at provincial seats, cities and counties Thursday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were laid before the statues of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk in Hoeryong City, Kim Jong Suk County, Kim Jong Suk Naval University and Kim Jong Suk General Military Academy on Thursday, her 98th birth anniversary.
					 Present at the floral basket-laying ceremonies were officials of the local party and power bodies and working people's organizations, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, people from all walks of life and school youths and children.
					
					 Laid before the statues were floral baskets in the names of the local party and power bodies, working people's organizations, units of KPA and KPISF, industrial establishments, farms, schools, etc. and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 The participants paid high tribute to her.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers Meet
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers Meet 
 Sariwon, December 24 (KCNA) -- There took place a platform of true stories "General and Farmers" by agricultural workers at the Migok Co-op Farm in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province, on Thursday. 
					 Present there were Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the Agricultural Workers' Union of Korea, Ri Won Jong, secretary of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, officials and members of the union in the city. 
					
					 Song Yun Hui, chairwoman of the Management Board of the Migok Co-op Farm, recalled the Sunday when leader Kim Jong Il visited the farm for the first time in the new century. 
					
					 She said that Kim Jong Il visited the farm several times to put forward it as model farm in the Songun era and the 10th scenic spot of Songun. 
					
					 Hwang Yun Nam, chairman of the Management Board of the Oguk Co-op Farm in Anak County, said that Kim Jong Il learned in detail about the crop production and living condition of the farm and took all the necessary measures and had taken even a picture. 
					
					 Pang Yong Sik, chairman of the Kangan-ri Committee of the agricultural workers' union in Unpha County, recalled the day he had honor to meet Kim Jong Il at a post during the days of his military service. 
					
					 Sim Sun Nyo, farmer of the Songho Co-op Farm in Yonan County, referred to the trust and loving care of Kim Jong Il who put forward her husband, farmer in Yonbaek Plain, as farmer hero.

articles.title: Important Day Celebrated in DPRK
articles.content:
Important Day Celebrated in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Art performances were given by art organizations in Pyongyang and local areas on Thursday, the 24th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 98th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The Mansudae Art Troupe gave a performance at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre.
					
					 Put on the stage were such numbers as male solo "The General Is the Son of the Guerrillas" and dance "Azalea of Homeland".
					
					 The performers praised the revolutionary careers and feats of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 Artistes of the National Symphony Orchestra gave a concert "Ode to Comrade Kim Jong Il" at the Moranbong Theatre.
					
					 A drama was performed at the National Theatre.
					
					 Artistes of the National Folk Art Troupe gave a folk dance suite "People in the Walled City of Pyongyang" at the Ponghwa Art Theatre and artistes of the National Circus gave a performance at the Pyongyang Circus Theater.
					
					 There took place art performances in South and North Phyongan, Jagang, South Hwanghae, Kangwon, South Hamgyong and Ryanggang provinces and other local areas.

articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from Tajik Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from Tajik Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message from Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, on Dec. 15.
					 The message said that the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, on behalf of the Tajik communists, expressed deep condolences to Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the fourth anniversary of demise of the great leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il will always be alive in their hearts as the sun, the message noted, adding:
					
					 We wish you good health and fresh success in your work for socialist construction and national reunification.

articles.title: Devoted Efforts Made by Kim Jong Il to Strengthen KPA
articles.content:
Devoted Efforts Made by Kim Jong Il to Strengthen KPA
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Twenty-four years has passed since leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 On this occasion, the servicepersons and civilians of the DPRK recall with deep emotion the tireless efforts Kim Jong Il paid to strengthening the KPA.
					
					 He began his Songun (military-first) revolutionary leadership with an inspection of the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the KPA on August 25, Juche 49 (1960).
					
					 During his guidance over the Songun revolution he had made a journey of more than 630 000 kilometers, visiting 12 790 military and civilian units without regard to weather conditions or day and night.
					
					 His inspection of the Dwarf Pine Post on January 1, 1995, represented his steadfast will to accomplish the cause of socialism with arms. Since then, he had inspected more than 2 490 military units till the last moments of his life.
					
					 It was in March 1996 that he first went over the Chol Pass to visit frontline military units. Then he often drove over the pass to give strength and courage to the servicepersons defending the country and the people. Such inspection reached every military post throughout the country.
					
					 His energetic efforts and ceaseless military inspection strengthened the KPA into the invincible Paektusan army and turned all its men and officers into stalwart combatants and persons strong in faith and ideology who are ready to dedicate their lives to defending the party and the leader and the country and the people.
					
					 Now the men and officers of the KPA are fully determined to win the final victory of the Songun revolution under the guidance of KPA Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Tourism Not Withered This Year: SGBT official
articles.content:
Tourism Not Withered This Year: SGBT official
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The number of foreign tourists has been on the steady increase this year despite of unfavorable conditions, said Hong In Chol, a department director of the State General Bureau of Tourism (SGBT).
					 Tourism was frozen till mid-March by the governmental measure for quarantining the infection ways of Ebola, he said, and continued:
					
					 In August, the situation was aggravated on the Korean Peninsula due to the reckless military provocations of the hostile forces, but foreign tourists were not hindered in their entry into the DPRK.
					
					 Among them were tourists from different countries like Malaysia, Singapore, Germany, Russia, Switzerland, France, Finland, UK and Spain.
					
					 Tourists spent pleasant days during their tour of Pyongyang, Kaesong, Mts. Paektu, Myohyang and Kumgang and other well-known areas of the country.
					
					 The immigration has also been simplified to fully meet the requirements of foreigners.

articles.title: 28 Athletes Qualified for Olympic Games
articles.content:
28 Athletes Qualified for Olympic Games
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- 28 athletes of the DPRK had been qualified for the 31st Olympic Games, as of the end of November, according to data available at the Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports.
					 In recent three months alone, over ten athletes were qualified in weightlifting, artistic gymnastics and other events.
					
					 It is expected that the number of qualifiers will increase in judo and boxing events.
					
					 Women and men football players, in particular, are attracting public attention as they have proved successful in different international games.
					
					 The DPRK has won 47 Olympic medals in total, including 14 golds.
					
					 Wrestler Kim Il and quadruple world judo champion Kye Sun Hui top the list of Olympic medal standings, the former with two golds in 1992 and 1996 and the latter with a gold, a bronze and a silver in 1996, 2000 and 2004.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- A home-visiting group of students of Korean University of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Thursday.
					 They placed a bunch of flowers before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: U.S. Termed Provoker of New War: KCNA
articles.content:
U.S. Termed Provoker of New War: KCNA
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency released a detailed report Thursday as regards the situation on the Korean Peninsula in 2015. 
					 According to the report, the DPRK, at the beginning of the year, mapped out a grand plan for building a thriving nation, made a series of constructive proposals to defuse tension and create a peaceful environment on the peninsula and did every effort to realize them.
					
					 But those proposals faced only frosty response from the U.S. administration which has pursued the most ferocious hostile policy toward the DPRK in history, the report said, and went on:
					
					 On January 22, U.S. President Obama, spouting rubbish hurting the DPRK, openly cried out for bringing it down as early as possible.
					
					 The Obama Administration set this year as a war year and set August when Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills began as the month when a war will start, and masterminded an unheard-of racket to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 It employed all means and methods to round off legal and institutional mechanism to stifle the DPRK, as evidenced by the "presidential executive order" on January 2 that declared "additional sanctions" upon the latter.
					
					 The degree of ideological and cultural poisoning and psychological warfare against the DPRK reached an extreme pitch with an aim to destabilize and topple it.
					
					 The U.S. made its clear appearance as the one trying to ignite a new Korean war when it tightened its control over and intervention in the politics and military and diplomatic affairs of south Korea.
					
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills staged from March 2 to April 24 were the prelude to a war, which resulted in the August crisis.
					
					 For these war rehearsals, the U.S. organized even the staff of the U.S.-south Korea joint division and detailed the military operation and plans and reinforced the system and machineries of its forces to execute a war.
					
					 Its war moves reached the fiercest phase during Ulji Freedom Guardian war rehearsal that brought the August crisis.
					
					 OPLAN 5015 finally agreed upon with the south Korean regime in June was applied to the war rehearsal.
					
					 The U.S., after creating all conditions and environment for provoking a war in August, let the south Korean regime orchestrate conspiratorial events like "mine explosion" and "north's shelling" and under that pretext fire dozens of shells at the territory of the DPRK in a bid to push the situation to the brink of a war.
					
					 This was just like what it did during the 1950s when it instigated the Syngman-Rhee clique of south Korea to igniting the June 25 war.
					
					 To cope with the prevailing situation, the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea convened an emergency enlarged meeting on August 20 and issued an order to put the frontline area of the country on a semi-war state.
					
					 In response to the appeal made by the party and the government of the DPRK to avert a war and protect peace, all the service personnel and people determinedly stood up against the war moves of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities.
					
					 The U.S. plot for a new war was disrupted by the toughest backlash by the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Thanks to the positive efforts made by the DPRK, a joint press release was published at the north-south high-level emergency contact held in Panmunjom from August 22 to 24. The situation seemed to have made a U-turn, from crisis of war to dialogue for peace and stability.
					
					 However, it again got worse due to the hideous hostile moves of the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. brought the Ronald Reagan nuclear carrier task force targeting the DPRK to the vicinity of the peninsula for war racket for invading the north during the reunion of the separated families and relatives from the north and the south in October, chilling the atmosphere of the reunion and again revealing its scenario for igniting a war. 
					
					 Witnessing the worst situation on the Korean Peninsula in 2015, the service personnel and people of the DPRK realized once again that the U.S. is, indeed, the arch criminal harassing peace and that they should stand up against it with only strong arms of Songun and war deterrent for self-defence.
					
					 They became more convinced that it is the only way for achieving durable peace to conclude a peace treaty with the U.S. or to set out on a final great war of justice against it.
					
					 If Washington fails to drop its hostile policy toward the DPRK, persistently dreaming a daydream about "collapse of north Korea", it will only invite latter's backlash going beyond its imagination.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary History
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary History
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an editorial says that holding leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem at the top post of the revolutionary armed forces 24 years ago was the greatest honor and fortune for the DPRK.
					 The history of Songun revolutionary leadership made by Kim Jong Il after assuming supreme commandership has been recorded as a heroic epic represented by the immortal exploits he performed before the century with his rare wisdom, outstanding commanding art and dynamic revolutionary practices, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 His assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army in the early 1990s when the world political situation was undergoing a rapid change made it possible to make a breakthrough for the victory of the Korean revolution and the socialist movement and give steady continuity to the sacred history of Songun revolution on a new high stage. The history of his revolutionary leadership over 2 decades since then is shining with the immortal feats he performed by providing a solid political and military guarantee for the eternal future of the country with his outstanding and far-sighted Songun politics and through high-intensity forced march of patriotic devotion.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il who made a long journey to the front to safeguard the country out of his indomitable will of Songun, the Korean revolution could win victories while remaining unfazed despite the strong wind of the times, and the service personnel and people of the DPRK work miracles of history never known before.
					
					 Dramatic events and epochal changes were made in the DPRK and the Korean revolution from the 1990s to the 2010s and the great victory in national history was won and heroic myths were created in defending socialism and building a thriving nation in the new century of Juche. These will tell about his great Songun revolutionary exploits for all ages.
					
					 The editorial calls for glorifying forever his immortal Songun revolutionary feats, keeping them as the eternal treasure of the revolution.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Settle Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Settle Its Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- A "girl's statue for peace" depicting a victim of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army was erected in Toronto, Canada. 
					 It was not the first one. Similar statues were already built in California and Michigan of the U.S. 
					
					 This shows what a bitter pain the fascist empire in the East in the past left in the hearts of mankind and how earnest demand the world people have to have the past crimes settled, Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in a commentary. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Now all the countries of the world feel hatred to Japan's attitude towards the past crimes, sexual slavery, in particular. It is because the Japanese imperialists provided women as expendables for war like munitions on the basis of abnormal sophism that it was necessary to satisfy soldiers' sexual demand to maintain combat capability of the army. Moreover, the Japanese reactionaries resort to a sleight of hand to cover up the truth behind the group rape committed under the patronage of the state, and to evade the settlement of the past. 
					
					 It is all the more serious because the chief executive and the ruling party of Japan take the lead in distorting history. 
					
					 Distortion of history has been the state policy since the emergence of the present government of Japan. 
					
					 Practically, the ruling quarters of Japan take the lead in evading the past crimes and social, media and educational fields join in history-distorting in unity and the whole society of Japan has deeply plunged in turbid waters of ultra-nationalism and revanchism. 
					
					 Japan should bear in mind that its way-out is not reinvasion but the settlement of the past. 
					
					 The more desperately the Japanese reactionaries distort and deny its crime-woven history which can never be pardoned through generations, the more "girl's statues for peace" will appear in many parts of the world in denunciation of their behaviors.

articles.title: Earthquake Hits Iksan, North Jolla Province, S. Korea
articles.content:
Earthquake Hits Iksan, North Jolla Province, S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- An earthquake measuring 3.9 on the Richter scale occurred in Hwangdung-myon, Iksan City, North Jolla Province, south Korea on Tuesday, according to the south Korean KBS. 
					 A strong tremor was felt with buildings shaking. 
					
					 Tremor was felt not only in North Jolla Province but also in Taejon and Kyonggi Province.

articles.title: Christians Denounce U.S. Germ Experiments in S. Korea
articles.content:
Christians Denounce U.S. Germ Experiments in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Pastors and other Christians of south Korea held a prayer meeting in Seoul Monday and condemned the U.S. anthrax germ experiments, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Sibo.
					 Charging that the U.S. conducted a germ experiment in the center of Seoul, speakers deplored the plight of south Korea as a colony of the U.S.
					
					 And it is because of the national division caused by the U.S. that the number of south Korean suicides tops the world list, they noted, calling for wiping out the evil U.S. imperialists by dint of justice.

articles.title: U.S. Accused of Its Germ Experiments in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Accused of Its Germ Experiments in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the North Side Headquarters of the Nationwide Special Committee for Probing the Truth behind the GIs' Crimes released a statement Thursday as regards the disclosure of the fact that the U.S. has systematically brought anthrax and pest germs to its military bases in south Korea and conducted germ experiments with the tacit connivance of the south Korean regime.
					 On Dec. 17 the south Korea-U.S. "joint working group" formed to probe into the case of the U.S. forces' illegal introduction of anthrax germs caved in to the strong public protest at home and abroad and officially confessed that the U.S. has brought anthrax germs to its military base in Ryongsan to conduct experiments 15 times from 2009 to 2014 and introduced even pest germs in that course. 
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 This means that the U.S. made a sheer lie when it claimed just after the disclosure of the anthrax germs introduction in May that it conducted the first germ experiment. It also proves that the U.S. is stepping up its preparations for bio-chemical warfare out of its sinister design to stifle the DPRK and exterminate the Korean nation.
					
					 The recently disclosed germ experiments are only a small part of the unabated terrible crimes being committed by the U.S. in south Korea for its bio-chemical warfare.
					
					 Due to the U.S. moves for nuclear and bio-chemical warfare against humanity, south Korea has turned into the world's biggest nuclear arsenal and worst bio-chemical weapons test ground.
					
					 Serious is that the U.S. germ experiments are being connived and shielded by the south Korean group of traitors. 
					
					 The south Korean ruling quarters are, indeed, a group of thrice-cursed traitors that can never be pardoned as they failed to say even a word of protest against the U.S. bio-chemical weapon tests in south Korea but supported them.
					
					 Embarrassed with mounting public criticism at home and abroad against their ferocious moves for igniting a bio-chemical war, the U.S. and the south Korean authorities are going so shameless as to assert that the experiments are set to "cope with threat coming from bio-chemical weapons" of someone.
					
					 If the brutal and reckless moves of the U.S. for a nuclear and bio-chemical war are overlooked, all Koreans including the south Korean people will never escape a holocaust.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- There took place remembrance meetings, book and photo exhibitions and film shows in Norway, Thailand and Malaysia on December 16 and 17 on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The participants laid bouquets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway said that Kim Jong Il developed the Workers' Party of Korea into the powerful Juche-type revolutionary party, firmly defended the dignity and sovereignty of the country and laid a firm foundation for the building of a thriving nation by pursuing the original Songun politics.
					
					 The chairman of the Thai committee for remembering H.E. Kim Jong Il praised Kim Jong Il as an outstanding thinker and theoretician who indicated the road to be taken by humankind by developing the Juche Idea, founded by Kim Il Sung, and as a benevolent father of the Korean people who dedicated himself to the people's happiness.
					
					 The chairman of the Thailand-Korea Friendship Association said it is one of the great exploits performed by Kim Jong Il that he defended the sovereignty of the country and the nation and ensured the bright future for the Korean people by pursuing Songun politics.
					
					 Messages to supreme leader Kim Jong Un were adopted at the remembrance meetings held in Norway and Thailand.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Seminars and book and photo exhibitions took place in the UK, Finland and Egypt from Dec. 12 to 15 on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venues were photos dealing with the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il and exploits of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were works of the peerlessly great men, and books and photos introducing the struggle of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK. 
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain said Kim Jong Il was a great thinker and theoretician who proved the invincibility of socialism on the basis of scientific analysis with his energetic ideological and theoretical activities throughout his life.
					
					 The chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said it was entirely thanks to Kim Jong Il who indicated the bright way for the Korean people and laid a firm foundation for the development of the country that they have always won victories in the building of a thriving nation. 
					
					 A letter and a message to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the seminars in the UK and Finland.

articles.title: Delegations of Foreign Political Parties, Organizations, Personages Visit DPRK Missions in Their Countries
articles.content:
Delegations of Foreign Political Parties, Organizations, Personages Visit DPRK Missions in Their Countries
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Delegations of political parties and organizations and figures of various circles of various countries visited the DPRK missions in their countries from Dec. 10 to 17 on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included a delegation of the Socialist Party of Romania, delegation of the Romania-Korea Friendship Association, delegation of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru, general secretary of the  Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Bangladesh Communist Party, chairman of the Bangladesh People's League, chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, department director of the Presidency of Uganda, chairman of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist) and the chairman of the Korean Friendship Association UK.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and pictures showing them standing together and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Socialist Party of Romania, said that his party would do its best to develop the relations with the Workers' Party of Korea and extend positive support to the Korean people in their just struggle under the banner of socialism.
					
					 Victor Oliva Miguel, general secretary of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru, noted that Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career and exploits would always be kept in the hearts of the world progressives.
					
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association UK, stressed that Marshal Kim Jong Un is adding more shine to Kim Jong Il's idea and exploits.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the International Commerce Promotion Center of Myanmar sent floral baskets to the DPRK mission in the country on Dec. 17.

articles.title: Demise Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Demise Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Various events were held in foreign countries on Dec. 14 and 15 on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included an opening ceremony of a Korean photo, book and handicrafts exhibition in Russia, a meeting, photo and book exhibition and film show in Mexico and round-table talks and film show in Myanmar.
					
					 Displayed at the venues were photos showing the undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on show were their works, and books and photos showing the DPRK and handicrafts associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean people. 
					
					 Participants in the film shows watched the Korean films "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity" and "Masikryong Ski Resort".

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences Posted by UK Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences Posted by UK Organization
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The gist of Vol. 5 and Vol. 8 (Continuing Edition) of Part 1 the Anti-Japanese Revolution of "With the Century", reminiscences of President Kim Il Sung, was posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on its website on December 18.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia entrenamiento de enfrentamiento de unidades combinadas de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia entrenamiento de enfrentamiento de unidades combinadas de EPC
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio un entrenamiento real de enfrentamiento entre las grandes unidades combinadas 526 y 671 del EPC.
					En el puesto de vigilancia, el Comandante Supremo escucho el parte sobre el plan de entrenamiento.
					
					Viendo los ejercicios que se realizan enconadamente en medio de estruendosas explosiones, columnas de fuego y humos densos, se mostro muy complacido diciendo que son excelentes la defensa y el ataque.
					
					Puede saber bien que este ano el EPC realizo los ejercicios de alta intensidad para cumplir las tareas dadas en el ano pasado por el mismo viendo el entrenamiento similar de las mismas grandes unidades combinadas, asevero y destaco la necesidad de organizar tambien en el futuro mucho mas tales ejercicios en el EPC.
					
					Evaluo altamente los exitos en los ejercicios diciendo que a traves del entrenamiento de hoy las grandes unidades combinadas mostraron sin reserva que ya tienen la perfecta capacidad de defensa y ataque fuerte que pueda frustrar a tiempo la invasion inesperada de los enemigos y pasar al ataque.
					
					El Mariscal presento las tareas programaticas que se sirven de guia en intensificar mas el entrenamiento de combate del EPC.
					
					A fin de hacer frente a la guerra mas enconada y severa necesitan realizar con frecuencia los ejercicios practicos, puntualizo y continuo que por mucho que efectuen los ejercicios formalizados, acostumbrados, emperifollados y no convenientes a la demanda y el aspecto de la guerra moderna y a las caracteristicas del cumplimiento de mision de combate de la unidad son inutiles.
					
					Dio valiosas instrucciones para el perfeccionamiento de los preparativos de combate incluyendo el problema de elevar mas  la responsabilidad y el papel de los comandantes y funcionarios de entrenamiento, las misiones de los comandantes y funcionarios del Estado Mayor en estudiar profundamente las distintas situaciones que pueden presentarse en el ataque y la defensa y desplegar altamente la iniciativa y la creatividad en el combate, el asunto de perfeccionar la cooperacion estrecha entre los tipos de ejercito y armas y las unidades especializadas, el de asegurar la sorpresa, la velocidad, la conformidad y la exactitud de las acciones de combate, el de elevar la capacidad de cumplimiento de operaciones sin hacer caso de las estaciones, temperaturas, dia y noche, el de acostumbrar a los militares con los metodos de acciones de combate capaces de utilizarlos en el combate real, el de seguir prestando mayores atenciones a las labores de modernizacion de equipos de las sub
					
					 unidades encargadas de aseguramiento de avance, etc.
					
					Expuso gran esperanza y conviccion de que bajo la consigna del Partido de dar prioridad al ejercicio el EPC levantara mas fuerte oleada de entrenamiento del monte Paektu para acoger el VII Congreso del PTC con los exitos orgullosos de aumento de combatividad y de perfeccionamiento de preparativos de combate.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Ri Jong Ok
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Ri Jong Ok 
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio este jueves una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Ri Jong Ok, ex combatiente revolucionario antijapones, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con nuevo embajador britanico
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con nuevo embajador britanico
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Alastair William James Morgan presento el dia 24 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de Gran Bretana en la RPDC.
					Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: Rinden tributo a Kim Jong Suk con motivo de 98o aniversario de su natalicio
articles.content:
Rinden tributo a Kim Jong Suk con motivo de 98o aniversario de su natalicio
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 98o aniversario del natalicio de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk, fueron colocadas el dia 24 las ofrendas florales ante su busto en el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el Monte Taesong.
					Al pie del busto de la Heroina estaba colocada una ofrenda floral enviada por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					En la ceremonia de homenaje participaron Pak Yong Sik, Kwak Pom Gi, Kim Phyong Hae, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin, Kim Su Gil, secretario jefe del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la ciudad de Pyongyang, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, el Consejo de Ministros y entidades de masas y los trabajadores capitalinos. 
					
					Alli fueron depositadas las ofrendas florales a nombre del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Tambien, fueron puestas las otras a nombre del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, entidades de masas, unidades del EPC, instituciones del partido y el poder y fabricas de la capital. 
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio recordando la vida revolucionaria de la Heroina. 
					
					El mismo dia, lo hizo tambien el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.

articles.title: Premian a fabricadores de tren electrico subterraneo
articles.content:
Premian a fabricadores de tren electrico subterraneo
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hubo la premiacion estatal a los funcionarios, obreros, cientificos, tecnicos, profesores e investigadores del Complejo de Locomotoras Electricas Kim Jong Thae y de rama corelacionada quienes fabricaron un nuevo tren electrico subterraneo.
					En cooperacion con los cientificos, tecnicos, profesores e investigadores de la rama, los obreros del citado complejo fabricaron a estilo coreano el tren electrico que exige la tecnologia de punta.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 24 la ceremonia de premiacion estatal.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los funcionarios, obreros, cientificos, tecnicos, profesores e investigadores del Complejo y de rama concerniente.
					
					El titulo del Heroe del Trabajo de la RPDC, la Medalla de Oro (El Martillo y la Hoz) y la Orden Bandera Nacional de Primera Clase fueron otorgados a Pak Song Hak, profesor de la Universidad de Ferrocarriles de Pyongyang, y a Pak Mun Son, jefe de brigada del Complejo.
					
					El reloj con el nombre del Presidente Kim Il Sung se entrego al profesor de la Universidad de Ferrocarriles de Pyongyang, Kim Kum Chol, el montador del Complejo, Kim Myong Bok, el solador Choe Kyong Chol, el jefe de equipo de trabajo, Ri Song Jin y el jefe de taller, Sin Sun Thae.
					
					El diploma de honor del Mariscal Kim Jong Un fue concedido al profesor de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, Won Kyong Su, el jefe de oficina de la Filial de Ciencia Ferroviaria de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, Jo Song Chol, el secretario jefe del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en el Complejo, Kim Chol Su, el fundidor Ku Pon Son, el jefe de equipo de trabajo, Kim Chun Ho, el subjefe de taller Jon Song Hyon, los jefes de taller, Rim Ho y Yu Jae Sik y el director del Ministerio del Ferrocarril, Ri Jong Sik.
					
					Fueron otorgados el titulo de Disenador Benemerito a Ri Su Song, disenador del Instituto de Diseno de Vagon del Ministerio del Ferrocarril, el titulo de Cientifico Benemerito a Choe Yong Nam, investigador de la Universidad de Ferrocarriles de Pyongyang, y el titulo de Tecnico Benemerito a Kim Chol Min, subingeniero-jefe del Complejo en cuestion.
					
					La Orden Bandera Nacional de Primera Clase fue otorgada a 12 personas y la Orden de Trabajo a 28. 
					
					Muchos funcionarios, obreros, cientificos, tecnicos, profesores e investigadores recibieron las ordenes y medallas.

articles.title: Banquete en honor de fabricadores de tren electrico subterraneo
articles.content:
Banquete en honor de fabricadores de tren electrico subterraneo
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 24 en la Casa Mokran un banquete en honor de los funcionarios, obreros, cientificos, tecnicos, profesores e  investigadores del Complejo de Locomotoras Electricas Kim Jong Thae y la rama correspondiente quienes fabricaron un nuevo tren electrico subterraneo.
					  A la recepcion fueron invitados los funcionarios, obreros, cientificos, tecnicos, profesores e investigadores correspondientes.
					
					  Tambien, participaron en el Pak Pong Ju, Choe Thae Bok, O Su Yong, Ro Tu Chol, Jo Yon Jun y el vicepremier Kim Tok Hun.
					
					  En la ocasion pronuncio el discurso Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros.
					
					  Por el encargo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, dio calurosas felicitaciones a los fabricadores de nuevo tren subterraneo al estilo coreano.
					
					  Dijo que a traves del proceso de producir con sus propias fuerzas y tecnica el tren electrico subterraneo, ellos mostraron no con las palabras, sino con la practica la justeza de la decision del Partido de acelerar la construccion de una potencia economica confiando y apoyandose en la naturaleza y el espiritu revolucionario de autoconfianza de la heroica clase obrera, fuerzas medulares.
					
					  Subrayo la necesidad de seguir innovando y avanzando con las fuerzas inagotables de la heroica clase obrera Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il para hacer brillar con nuevos exitos el VII Congreso del PTC.

articles.title: Direccion Nortena de Jonminthukwi revela crimen de guerra bacteriologica de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Direccion Nortena de Jonminthukwi revela crimen de guerra bacteriologica de EE.UU. 
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con el hecho recien revelado de que Estados Unidos. perpetro los experimentos de armas bacteriologicas introduciendo sistematicamente los bacilos de antracosis y peste en sus bases militares en el Sur de Corea bajo la tolerancia de las autoridades surcoreanas, el portavoz de la direccion nortena del Comite Pannacional de Averiguacion Especial para Esclarecer Verdaderos Aspectos de Crimenes de Tropas Norteamericanas (Jonminthukwi) hizo publica el dia 24 la siguiente declaracion:
					El dia 17, el "grupo de trabajo conjunto" Sur de Corea-EE.UU., organizado para esclarecer el caso de introduccion ilicita de bacilos de antracosis en el suelo surcoreano cometida por las tropas norteamericanas, confeso oficialmente, doblegandose ante la fuerte protesta del interior y exterior, el hecho de que desde el ano 2009 hasta 2014 EE.UU. porto en 15 ocasiones los bacilos de antracosis en su base militar en Ryongsan y realizo las pruebas de armas biologicas y en ese curso tambien se llevo a dentro los bacilos de peste. 
					
					Por eso, se puso al desnudo la mentira de EE.UU. que aclaro como primer ensayo en mayo pasado cuando se habia producido el incidente de introduccion de bacilos de antracosis. Tambien, se ha revelado que el imperio se entrega con frenesi a los preparativos de la guerra bioquimica a fin de derrocar la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y exterminar a toda la nacion coreana. 
					
					El presente caso no pasa de ser una parte del horroroso crimen de la guerra bioquimica de EE.UU. que se realiza en el suelo surcoreano. 
					
					Debido a los preparativos de la guerra nuclear y bioquimica de caracter antietico de EE.UU., el Sur de Corea se convierte no solo en el mayor arsenal nuclear del mundo, sino tambien en el campo de pruebas de armas bioquimicas. 
					
					Lo mas grave del caso es que las atrocidades bioquimicas de EE.UU. se comenten bajo la tolerancia de los traidores surcoreanos. 
					
					Aturdidos ante la creciente denuncia del interior y exterior, EE.UU. y los traidores surcoreanos actuan sin escrupulos para justificar sus crimenes diciendo que la "prueba es para hacer frente a la amenaza de armas bioquimicas" de alguien. 
					
					Si estamos con brazos cruzados ante las barbaras e imprudentes maniobras de guerra bioquimica de EE.UU., la poblacion surcoreana y otros integrantes de la nacion coreana no podran evitar los desastres irremediables.

articles.title: ACNC condena a EE.UU., caudillo de provocacion de nueva guerra
articles.content:
ACNC condena a EE.UU., caudillo de provocacion de nueva guerra
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- La Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea hizo publica el dia 24 una informacion detallada alusiva a la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana en 2015.
					  Segun el documento, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea presento a principios del presente ano las propuestas constructivas para prevenir la agravacion de la situacion y preparar el ambiente pacifico en la Peninsula Coreana tramando la gran perspectiva de la construccion de un Estado prospero e hizo todos los esfuerzos por materializarlas.
					
					  Pero, la politica sobre la RPDC de la actual administracion norteamericana correspondiente a las propuestas y el proceso de su practica, fueron mas hostiles y brutales sin precedentes.
					
					  El 22 de enero, el presidente estadounidense Obama, insatisfecho con calumniar a la RPDC con malicia, disparateo abiertamente que hay que "derrumbarla" cuanto antes.
					
					  La administracion de Obama determino este ano como ano de guerra y agosto en que se libraron los ejercicios militares conjuntos Ulji Freedom Guardian como mes de inicio de guerra y desarrollo la campana de aplastamiento sin precedente.
					
					  El 2 de enero publico la "orden administrativa del presidente" de aplicar la "sancion adicional" contra la RPDC y movilizo todos los medios y metodos en perfeccionar los aparatos legales e institucionales para aplastar a la RPDC.
					
					  Bajo las extremas circunstancias libro la campana del complot ideo-cultural y psicologico encaminada a  descomponer y derribar la RPDC desde su interior.
					
					  La naturaleza de EE.UU., provocador de nueva guerra coreana, se revelo claramente en la intervencion y el control sin precedentes en los asuntos politicos, militares y diplomaticos del Sur de Corea.
					
					  Los ejercicios militares conjuntos Key Resolve, Foal Eagle realizados desde el 2 de marzo hasta el 24 de abril, fueron el preludio del inicio de guerra que causo el estado emergente de agosto.
					
					  Para dicho simulacro, Estados Unidos organizo hasta el Estado Mayor de la division combinada EE.UU.-Sur de Corea, aparato terrorista de gran tamano y arreglo y reforzo la operacion militar, el plan, el sistema y los aparatos de las tropas norteamericanas conforme al cumplimiento de la guerra real.
					
					  Las maniobras de EE.UU. tendentes a provocar nueva guerra llegaron al climax en la historia con motivo de los ejercicios militares conjuntos UFG que llevo la situacion de agosto.
					
					Durante ese simulacro, puso oficialmente en funcionamiento  "OPLAN 5015", nuevo guion de guerra de agresion al Norte acordado con las autoridades surcoreanas.
					
					EE.UU., que creo toda la condicion y ambiente para la provocacion de guerra coreana en agosto, incito a las autoridades surcoreanas a inventar los casos conspirativos tales como la "explosion de mina" y el "lanzamiento de proyectiles del Norte" y a disparar decenas de balas hacia nuestra parte tomandolos como pretexto. Asi llevo la  situacion de la Peninsula a la fase muy tirante. 
					
					Todo esto es igual a la manera de EE.UU. que en la decada de los 50 del siglo pasado instigo a la camarilla de Syngman Rhee a provocar la guerra de 25 de junio.
					
					Frente a la situacion creada, la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea convoco el 20 de agosto la urgente reunion ampliada y dio la orden de promulgar el estado de alerta de guerra en las zonas del frente.
					
					Todos los uniformados y civiles coreanos respondieron unanimemente al llamamiento del partido y gobierno por prevenir la guerra y defender la paz.
					
					Las maquinaciones del imperio para provocar nueva guerra se fracasaron completamente ante las contramedidas intransigentes del ejercito y pueblo coreanos.
					
					Gracias a nuestro esfuerzo iniciador, se realizo del dia 22 al 24 de agosto en Phanmunjom el contacto urgente de alto rango Norte-Sur y se publico la declaracion conjunta, gracias a lo cual la situacion acogio un cambio repentino desde la crisis de guerra hacia el dialogo para la paz y estabilidad.
					
					Sin embargo, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, que se dirigia al alivio, volvio a empeorarse debido a las aviesas maniobras hostiles del imperio contra la RPDC.
					
					Durante el tiempo del encuentro de familiares y parientes separados efectuado en octubre, EE.UU. desarrollo el simulacro de guerra de agresion al Norte despachando el colectivo de ataque de portaaviones nuclear Ronald Reagan. Asi echo el agua fria al ambiente de encuentro y demostro otra vez su intento de provocacion belica.
					
					A traves de la peor situacion de la Peninsula Coreana de este ano, el ejercito y pueblo coreanos volvieron a experimentar claramente que EE.UU. es el perturbador de la paz, y que hay que enfrentarse al imperio solamente con los fusiles del Songun y el poderoso disuasivo de guerra de caracter autodefensivo.
					
					Y se convencieron de que solo existen dos remedios para lograr la paz duradera: concertar el convenio de paz con EE.UU., parte de concertacion del acuerdo armisticio, o  desarrollar la sagrada batalla final justa para adelantar esa meta. 
					
					Si el imperio insiste persistentemente en el "derrumbe del Norte de Corea" sin abandonar su politica hostil anti-RPDC, experimentara una reaccion violenta de la RPDC nunca imaginable.

articles.title: Tiene lugar encuentro de mujeres N-S por reconciliacion, unidad, paz y reunificacion
articles.content:
Tiene lugar encuentro de mujeres N-S por reconciliacion, unidad, paz y reunificacion 
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 23 en Kaesong el encuentro de las mujeres de ambas partes de Corea por la reconciliacion, la unidad, la paz y la reunificacion de la nacion. 
					Participaron por la parte nortena las representantes del Comite Central de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea y varias entidades femeninas y, por la surena, las delegadas de la Confederacion de las Organizaciones de las Mujeres del Sur de Corea, la Solidaridad Nacional de Mujeres, la Sociedad de Mujeres por Lograr la Paz y otras entidades femeninas. 
					
					En la ocasion hubo discursos.
					
					Las oradoras senalaron que las mujeres del Norte y el Sur de Corea deben apreciar y ejecutar cabalmente el acuerdo Norte-Sur y abrir una nueva coyuntura de viraje para la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y la reunificacion independiente. 
					
					Insistieron en la necesidad de acabar con la confrontacion fratricida y el peligro de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, defender la seguridad nacional y la paz y fomentar la solidaridad de las mujeres Norte-Sur en la lucha por la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales, la paz y la reunificacion. 
					
					Acto seguido, fue aprobado un llamamiento a todas las mujeres del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar. 
					
					La nota asevera que las mujeres coreanas del Norte y el Sur de Corea y otras integrantes de la nacion coreana no desean el antagonismo y discordia entre los connacionales ni la hostilidad y enfrentamiento sino la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales, la paz y la reunificacion independiente de la patria. 
					
					Exhorta a eliminar en el territorio patrio el peligro de guerra y la confrontacion fratricida y defender con firmeza la seguridad y la paz de la nacion. 
					
					Expone la decision de dinamizar en el ano proximo los contactos, las visitas y las actividades solidarias de las entidades femeninas de ambas partes y realizar los encuentros de diversas formas para promover la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y lograr la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales. 
					
					Terminado el acto, los participantes vieron una funcion artistica de las entidades femeninas de ambas partes, visitaron los vestigios historicos de la zona de Kaesong y recorrieron la exposicion de articulos artesanales y bellas artes.

articles.title: Activo turismo de extranjeros en RPDC
articles.content:
Activo turismo de extranjeros en RPDC
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Pese a los factores desfavorables a las actividades de turismo, en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se activo mas el turismo de los extranjeros en comparacion con el ano pasado.
					   Asi declaro el director de la Direccion Nacional de Turismo, Hong In Chol a la ACNC, y prosiguio:
					
					   Debido a la prevencion de Evola, en la RPDC se inicio el turismo desde los mediados de marzo.
					
					   No fue parado el turismo aun en agosto pasado cuando se creo una situacion peligrosa en el pais debido a la imprudente provocacion militar de las fuerzas hostiles.
					
					   Muchos turistas provenientes de Malasia, Singapur, Alemania, Rusia, Suiza, Francia, Finlandia, Gran Bretana, Espana y otros paises pasaron dias alegres en los famosos polos turisticos como Pyongyang, Kaesong y los montes Paektu, Myohyang y Kumgang.
					
					   Los programas de turismo con varios temas como actividades en avion, maraton, bicicleta, esqui, pesca, cosecha de frutas, plantacion de arboles, vida en tienda de campana, el alpinismo, etc. gozaron de buena reputacion de los turistas europeos.
					
					   Este ano, de acuerdo con la politica estatal destinada al fomento de turismo, se simplifico el tramite de entrada y salida del pais, se satisficieron suficientemente las demandas de los turistas extranjeros y se presentaron varias mercancias de turismo en el mercado turistico europeo.
					
					   Tales esfuerzos atrajeron la atencion de las personas del mundo que quieren saber sobre nuestro pais.

articles.title: 28 jugadores de RPDC ganan boleto a XXXI Juegos Olimpicos
articles.content:
28 jugadores de RPDC ganan boleto a XXXI Juegos Olimpicos
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Este ano, se efectuaron en la palestra mundial muchas competencias internacionales inclusive los campeonatos mundiales por disciplinas que tambien tienen objeto de obtener el boleto a XXXI Juegos Olimpicos.
					Hasta finales del mes pasado, 28 jugadores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ganaron la calificacion de participar en ese festival deportivo.
					
					Durante los 3 meses ultimos, 10 jugadores coreanos ganaron el boleto en los juegos internacionales incluyendo el Campeonato Mundial de Levantamiento de Pesas y el otro de gimnasia de aparatos.
					
					Continuara el "reto" de los jugadores coreanos por obtener los mismos boletos y se estima el incremento de su numero a traves de las competencias de calificacion de varias disciplinas tales como judo y boxeo.
					
					Particularmente, se esperan en las actividades del equipo futbolistico femenino que se distingue como el potente asiatico y el otro masculino que avanzo a la competencia principal del Campeonato sub-23 de la Confederacion Asiatica de Futbol 2016 (los equipos ocupantes del primer, segundo y tercer lugares tomaran parte en los juegos olimpicos).
					
					Los deportistas coreanos ganaron 47 medallas en total incluyendo 14 preseas de oro en los juegos olimpicos estivales.
					
					El luchador Kim Il obtuvo dos medallas de oro en 1992 y 1996, y la judoka Kye Sun Hui, cuadrupla campeona mundial, obtuvo las medallas de oro, bronce y plata en 1996, 2000, 2004, respectivamente.
